      • User

        public User(java.lang.String name,
            java.lang.String id)
        Constructs a User object with the specified name and ID.
        pre:
        The name and ID are not null.
        post:
        A User object is created with the provided name, ID, and current date of vinculation.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the user.
        id - The ID of the user.

      • buyBP

        public java.lang.String buyBP(Payment newP,
                              BibliographicProduct newBP)
        Adds a new bibliographic product and payment to the user's lists and generates a bill.
        pre:
        The newP and newBP are not null.
        post:
        The newBP and newP are added to the user's bibliographic products and payments lists respectively.
        Parameters:
        newP - The payment for the bibliographic product.
        newBP - The bibliographic product to be added.
        Returns:
        A string representation of the bill for the purchase.

      • searchBP

        public BibliographicProduct searchBP(java.lang.String id)
        Searches for a bibliographic product in the user's list based on its ID.
        pre:
        The ID is not null.
        post:
        If a bibliographic product with the specified ID is found, it is returned; otherwise, null is returned.
        Parameters:
        id - The ID of the bibliographic product to search for.
        Returns:
        The bibliographic product with the specified ID, or null if it is not found.

      • orderBP

        public void orderBP()
        Orders the user's bibliographic products based on the publication date.
        pre:
        -
        post:
        The user's bibliographic products are ordered based on the publication date in ascending order.

      • generateLibrary

        public java.lang.String[][][] generateLibrary()
        Generates a library structure with the user's bibliographic products.
        pre:
        -
        post:
        A library structure is generated with the user's bibliographic products ordered by publication date.
        Returns:
        A three-dimensional array representing the library structure.

      • searchBP

        public java.lang.String searchBP(int x,
                                 int y,
                                 int z)
        Searches for a bibliographic product in the library structure based on its coordinates.
        pre:
        The coordinates (x, y, z) are within the valid range of the library structure.
        post:
        If a bibliographic product is found at the specified coordinates, its ID is returned; otherwise, "___" is returned.
        Parameters:
        x - The x-coordinate of the bibliographic product in the library structure.
        y - The y-coordinate of the bibliographic product in the library structure.
        z - The z-coordinate of the bibliographic product in the library structure.
        Returns:
        The ID of the bibliographic product at the specified coordinates, or "___" if it is not found.

      • cancelSuscription

        public void cancelSuscription(java.lang.String idM)
        Cancels the subscription for a bibliographic product.
        pre:
        The IDM is not null.
        post:
        If a bibliographic product with the specified ID is found, it is removed from the user's list; otherwise, no changes are made.
        Parameters:
        idM - The ID of the bibliographic product to cancel the subscription for.
